name: places/ChIJtVWJyq1ZwokRQWOHion5p7s
formattedAddress: 1216 Broadway 2nd floor, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1216 Broadway 2nd floor, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: Jennifer worked with me on landing my current job at Talon. It has been a great pleasure working with her throughout the hiring process. She is friendly and detail-oriented; her introduction about the hiring company was thorough and made it easy for the candidate to understand the company culture, the role, and objectives. Outside of this, Jennifer is also incredibly professional in communications; she responded to e-mails promptly, never left the candidate hanging, and provided updates at every step of the hiring process. I enjoyed working with her and am glad to be matched with a great company.

originalText.text:
Jennifer is a pleasure to work with. Her candid and forthright nature makes her an invaluable resource, particularly in the ever-changing landscape of the job market and recruitment.

She possesses an attention to detail that is unparalleled, and her responsiveness is truly commendable. In a world where time is of the essence, Jennifer consistently goes above and beyond to keep you informed about your status as a candidate. Her dedication to keeping you in the loop and addressing any questions you may have along the way is a testament to her commitment to her clients and candidates alike.

Working with Jennifer is not just about fulfilling a job requirement; it's an experience marked by transparency, efficiency, and genuine care. This dedication to her work is evident in every interaction, and it's clear that she takes great pride in helping individuals navigate the complexities of the job market.

I wholeheartedly recommend Jennifer to anyone seeking guidance, support, and results in their job search or recruitment efforts.

originalText.text:
I am pleased to provide my wholehearted recommendation for Jennifer Reid, an exceptional recruiter whose consultative approach has been instrumental in helping me elevate my resume. Jennifer's commitment to excellence and personalized guidance have truly set her apart.

Throughout our collaboration, Jennifer demonstrated an impressive ability to delve into the intricacies of my professional journey, extracting key accomplishments and skills that I had overlooked. Her meticulous attention to detail, combined with a genuine interest in understanding my career goals, resulted in a resume that not only highlighted my strengths but also resonated with my target roles.

What truly distinguishes Jennifer is her consultative approach. She didn't simply provide generic advice; rather, she took the time to comprehend my aspirations and tailored her recommendations accordingly. Her insightful suggestions ranged from optimizing the content and structure to showcasing my unique value proposition. Jennifer's expertise in the field became evident as she offered strategic insights that transformed my resume into a compelling narrative.

Furthermore, Jennifer's communication style made the entire process seamless and enjoyable. Her ability to convey constructive feedback with professionalism and kindness fostered a collaborative atmosphere. I always felt heard and supported, which boosted my confidence as we worked together to refine my resume.

In sum, Jennifer Reid's consultative approach to enhancing my resume has been a game changer in my pursuit of career growth. Her dedication, expertise, and thoughtful guidance have not only improved the tangible document but also empowered me with valuable insights for navigating the job market. I am sincerely grateful for her contributions and would highly recommend her services to anyone seeking to elevate their professional presentation

originalText.text: Our partnership with Jeff and AC Lions has consistently proven to be exceptional. Truly exceptional! His profound expertise and unwavering dedication to sourcing top-tier talent for Bonafide have exceeded my expectations. From day one, Jeff and his team understood our specific requirements and company culture, continuously presenting us with outstanding candidates for the roles we are considering. Their excellent communication and transparency make the entire hiring process smooth and successful for both candidates and me. Jeff and AC Lions are unquestionably one of my top choices when seeking top-notch talent acquisition support.

originalText.text:
Jennifer Reid's depth of knowledge and ability to communicate that knowledge into advanced, thorough guidance is unmatched in my experience.
She evaluated my resume after several other
"experts", finding significant gaps, while also taking the time to meet with me and understand my background, skills and passions. She combined all this to provide the single best career support l've ever received. Bottom line: before Jennifer, I landed zero interviews... after, I received an interview offer on every application, ultimately landing a position that has been THE match. I highly recommend Jennifer for career guidance, recruitment and everything in between.
